item.title: Senior SQL Server DBA / ASP.NET Developer (C#) (san rafael)
item.description:
We are a Software Company in Marin County in need of a .NET Developer with solid SQL Server DBA skills.
Our ideal candidate is highly skilled at performing data conversions using Transact-SQL and SSIS as well as developing browser based applications utilizing ASP.NET and C#.


Responsibilities
- Perform data conversions for new clients
- Develop interfaces in Transact-SQL and integration services packages
- Perform database maintenance tasks and performance tuning
- Assist with development of browser based applications

Required Qualifications
- Solid knowledge of SQL Server 2005, capable of writing complex stored procedures and triggers, and integration services packages
- Experience maintaining SQL Server databases
- Extensive experience in C# and ASP.NET development
- Solid background with JavaSript/AJAX
- Ability to work with minimal supervision
- Good organization and communication skills
- BA/BS Degree
- Experience with source code control software such as Source Safe, Subversion, Vault, or Fortress.

Desired Qualifications
- Knowledge of SQL Server 2008
- Experience working with SQL Server Service Broker
- Experience in the Insurance Industry
- Microsoft Technical Certifications
- Experience with Release Management
- Web Design aptitude
- SSRS experience
- Desire to learn

Please include cover letter and salary requirements with your resume. Local candidates only please (North Bay and SF)
item.dc:title: Senior SQL Server DBA / ASP.NET Developer (C#) (san rafael)
